languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} (PER) describes how well a character perceives their surroundings. Characters with high Perception can pick out a stray bolter shell casing in between the day-to-day morass of an underhive, or even tell when someone is being deceitful.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} and reduces enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} chance against a character's attacks.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} (ВОС) характеризует способность анализировать информацию об окружающем мире. При высоком значении персонаж сможет без труда заметить гильзу от болтера, нарушившую монотонную повседневность подулья, или понять, что собеседник лжет.
Восприятие влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навык{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательность{/g} и уменьшает шанс {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} для противников.

traits.locale_text:
Perception describes how well the character perceives their surroundings. Characters with high Perception can pick out a stray bolter shell casing left amidst an underhive morass, or tell when someone is being deceitful.
It also affects the Awareness skill and reduces enemy dodge chances against characters' attacks.

Perception (PER) describes how well a character perceives their surroundings. Characters with high Perception can pick out a stray bolter shell casing in between the day-to-day morass of an underhive, or even tell when someone is being deceitful.
It also affects the Awareness skill and reduces enemy dodge chance against a character's attacks.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} (PER) describes how well a character perceives their surroundings. Characters with high Perception can pick out a stray bolter shell casing in between the day-to-day morass of an underhive, or even tell when someone is being deceitful.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} and reduces enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} chance against a character's attacks.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} (PER) describes how well a character perceives their surroundings. Characters with high Perception can pick out a stray bolter shell casing in between the day-to-day morass of an underhive, or even tell when someone is being deceitful.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} and reduces enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} chance against a character's attacks.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}代表角色对周围环境的感知能力。感知高的角色，可以从巢都底层乱七八糟的杂物之中找到爆矢枪的弹壳，甚至可以分辨出其他人是否在欺骗自己。
此外，感知还会影响{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}，同时降低敌人{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}攻击的几率。

It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} and reduces enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} chance against a character's attacks.

此外，感知还会影响{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}，同时降低敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}攻击的几率。

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}代表角色对周围环境的感知能力。感知高的角色，可以从巢都底层乱七八糟的杂物之中找到爆矢枪的弹壳，甚至可以分辨出其他人是否在欺骗自己。
此外，感知还会影响{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}技能，同时降低敌人{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}攻击的几率。

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} (PER) describe lo bien que un personaje percibe su entorno. Los personajes con un nivel alto de Percepción pueden distinguir un casquillo de bólter en medio del ajetreo del fondo de una colmena e incluso darse cuenta de cuándo alguien les intenta engañar.
También afecta a la {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g} y reduce la probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} contra los ataques de un personaje.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} (PER) describes how well a character perceives their surroundings. Characters with high Perception can pick out a stray bolter shell casing in between the day-to-day morass of an underhive, or even tell when someone is being deceitful.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} and reduces enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} chance against a character's attacks.

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} (PER) describe lo bien que un personaje percibe su entorno. Los personajes con un nivel alto de Percepción pueden distinguir un casquillo de bólter en medio del ajetreo del fondo de una colmena e incluso darse cuenta de cuándo alguien les intenta engañar.
También afecta a la {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g} y reduce la probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} contra los ataques de un personaje.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}（PER）はキャラクターが周囲の状況をどの程度認識しているかを示す。PERが高いキャラクターほどアンダーハイヴを覆う泥沼の中からボルターシェルのケーシングを見つけたり、誰が騙そうとしているかを見抜いたりできる。
{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}にも影響し、キャラクターの攻撃に対する敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}率を減少させる効果もある。

It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} and reduces enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} chance against a character's attacks.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}（PER）はキャラクターが周囲の状況をどの程度認識しているかを示す。知性が高いキャラクターほどアンダーハイヴを覆う泥沼の中からボルターシェルのケーシングを見つけたり、誰が騙そうとしているかを見抜いたりできる。
{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識力{/g}スキルにも影響し、キャラクターの攻撃に対する敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}率を減少させる効果もある。

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} (ВОС) характеризует способность анализировать информацию об окружающем мире. При высоком значении персонаж сможет без труда заметить гильзу от болтера, нарушившую монотонную повседневность подулья, или понять, что собеседник лжет.
Восприятие влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навык{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательность{/g} и уменьшает шанс {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} для противников.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} (WAH) beschreibt, wie gut ein Charakter seine Umgebung wahrnimmt. Charaktere mit einem hohen Wahrnehmungswert können eine verirrte Bolter-Geschosshülse im alltäglichen Morast eines Unterschlupfs entdecken oder sogar erkennen, wenn jemand hinterhältig ist.
Beeinflusst auch die {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Achtsamkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeit{/g} und reduziert die feindliche {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichchance{/g} gegen Angriffe des Charakters.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} (PER) describes how well a character perceives their surroundings. Characters with high Perception can pick out a stray bolter shell casing in between the day-to-day morass of an underhive, or even tell when someone is being deceitful.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} and reduces enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} chance against a character's attacks.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} (WAH) beschreibt, wie gut ein Charakter seine Umgebung wahrnimmt. Charaktere mit einer hohen Wahrnehmungsfähigkeit können eine verirrte Bolter-Geschosshülse im alltäglichen Morast eines Unterschlupfs entdecken oder sogar erkennen, wenn jemand hinterhältig ist.
Beeinflusst auch die {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Achtsamkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeit{/g} und reduziert die feindliche {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichchance{/g} gegen Angriffe des Charakters.

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} (PER) décrit la façon dont un personnage perçoit son environnement. Les personnages dont le degré de Perception est élevé peuvent repérer une douille de bolter égarée dans le cloaque d'un monde souterrain, ou même savoir que quelqu'un ment.
La Perception influe également sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g} et réduit les chances d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de l'ennemi contre les attaques du personnage.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} (PER) describes how well a character perceives their surroundings. Characters with high Perception can pick out a stray bolter shell casing in between the day-to-day morass of an underhive, or even tell when someone is being deceitful.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} and reduces enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} chance against a character's attacks.

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} (PER) décrit la façon dont un personnage perçoit son environnement. Les personnages dont le degré de Perception est élevé peuvent repérer une douille de bolter égarée dans le cloaque d'un monde souterrain, ou même savoir que quelqu'un ment.
La Perception influe également sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Conscience{/g} et réduit les chances d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} de l'ennemi contre les attaques du personnage.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} (ALG), bir karakterin çevresini ne kadar iyi algılayabildiğini belirtir. Yüksek Algı'ya sahip bir karakter, kovanaltının günlük keşmekeşinde başıboş bir bulon mermisini seçebilir veya birisinin düzenbazlık peşinde olup olmadığını kestirebilir.
Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Farkındalık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}yeteneğine{/g} etki eder ve düşmanın karakterin saldırılarından {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} olasılığını azaltır.

It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} and reduces enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} chance against a character's attacks.
